Our team is always growing. Welcome aboard!

data.text:
‚ÄúThe digital hub of BairesDev allows them to find the best developers thanks to a powerful digital marketing development. In 2021, they received applications from more than 1.5 million programmers. The talent selection system, backed by Artificial Intelligence, enables them to hire 1% of the most technically skilled profiles. And this figure pales in comparison to what happened in 2022 when they received 2.4 million coders eager to be part of BairesDev.‚Äù Forbes Argentina profiles our CEO, Nacho De Marco, on the bootstrapped origin story of BairesDev and what has led to our explosive growth into a tech unicorn. ‚û°Ô∏è https://lnkd.in/d7wsKFPi

Thinking about bootstrapping or taking on VC investment for your startup? Take it from Nacho De Marco, who's the co-founder and CEO of a bootstrapped unicorn, as well as a General Partner at his own VC firm. His unique perspective offers valuable insights on how entrepreneurs should approach growing and scaling their companies. He is willing to share the best of both worlds at SXSW, discussing the topic in the panel "Bootstrap or VC Investment? Scaling Tips From a Unicorn." Are you interested in learning more about it? Just vote now and help us spread the word! How to vote: ‚û°Ô∏è Create an account: https://lnkd.in/fNqSTf4 ‚û°Ô∏è Click "Vote Up!": https://lnkd.in/d8YGMkXt Voting ends on August 18th, 11:59 PM EST.

Are we witnessing the end of open APIs? üòß X (formerly Twitter) and Reddit, Inc. have changed their API policies, impacting developers and applications. Why did they do it? The launch of ChatGPT by OpenAI changed the game. As companies realized the potential of large language models, they questioned the data sources fueling these models. Now, they want a share of the profits from their data. So, they responded by putting their APIs behind a paywall. What does it mean for the industry? Get the full scoop in our blog post. Link in comments. üëá

We're pleased to announce that BairesDev is sponsoring the ELC Annual Event 2024! Our CEO, Nacho De Marco, will be a key speaker on the panel ‚ÄúHow to Build Tech Teams Fast & Future-Proof Your Workforce in a Rapidly Changing Industry.‚Äù This insightful session will delve into: ‚úÖ Building and adapting high-performance engineering teams quickly. ‚úÖ Identifying and hiring top senior talent. ‚úÖ Forming and upskilling teams to meet evolving industry demands As a special treat for our followers, enjoy a 40% discount on tickets using the code BairesDev. ‚û°Ô∏è Register here: https://lnkd.in/dHksCBbQ üóìÔ∏è August 27, 11:00 AM PDT üìç San Francisco #ELCAnnual2024

Are you making these common API development mistakes? ‚ùå Insufficient security, scalability issues, poor documentation, integration challenges, and neglect of testing can lead to costly consequences. Learn how to avoid these pitfalls and build high-performance APIs in our latest carousel. Want to accelerate API Development at your company? See how we can help. Link in comments. üëá

Want to develop applications faster and improve the developer experience? An API-first design approach can help you achieve just that. An API-first strategy ensures: ‚úÖ Seamless integration across applications ‚úÖ Enhanced developer experience ‚úÖ Faster time-to-market ‚úÖ Cost reduction Learn more about the benefits of API-first design and how to implement it in your projects. Link in comments. üëá

Are you an accomplished #Java specialist keen to work on global projects? This is your chance! At BairesDev, we offer more than job opportunities‚Äîwe offer a pathway to success. Imagine working alongside the top 1% of tech experts in Latin America. Picture yourself contributing to groundbreaking projects that push the boundaries of innovation. Our CTO, Justice E., joined John Koetsier on the TechFirst podcast to talk about how our engineers are integrating GenAI into their daily workflows. Here are some key insights: ‚û°Ô∏è 72% of engineers use GenAI in their development process. ‚û°Ô∏è 48% use GenAI every single day. ‚û°Ô∏è 81% use GenAI to write code that was previously written manually. Listen to the full podcast to learn more about our journey with GenAI and its impact on productivity and innovation. Link in comments. üëá

Is website downtime killing your business? Here's how Gennev turned it around. Gennev's telehealth site faced frequent downtime. Patients couldn't book appointments. Revenue was at risk. We stepped in. The result? A stable site, satisfied patients, and a thriving business. Check out our carousel for the full story. Facing similar challenges?
